bibl.title: Journal of the General Union of Arab Archaeologists

seg: Magdy A.I. ‘Aly, Four Greek ostraca in the Egyptian Museum in Cairo.
Journal of the General Union of Arab Archaeologists (JGUAA) 6 (2021) 1, pp. 23-42, figg.

Brought to the Egyptian Museum in 1955 (from Elephantine or Syene). - 1. O. Cair. Inv. SR 18953 (6b). Granary receipt. 2nd century BC. - 2. Inv. SR 18953 (20b). Treasury receipt? Syene, May 3rd 87 BC. - 3. Inv. SR 18953 (6a). 3rd decania list. Beginning of 2nd century AD. - 4. Inv. SR 18953 (20a). A person name. 2nd century AD.
